original_text: But the first servant would not agree. He put the other servant in prison until he could pay his debt to him.
korean_text: 허락하지 아니하고 이에 가서 그가 빚을 갚도록 옥에 가두거늘

sentences.original_text: But the first servant would not agree
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 첫 번째 종은 동의하지 않았습니다

until he could pay his debt to him
